purpose: Blends maturity, opportunity, and tech fit into a composite score for capabilities (L1-L3).
formulaSummary: Composite = blend(leaf scores, children composites, weights) with 0.5 parent/child blend.
assumptions: Weights are normalized per project and persisted locally
Missing child scores fall back to parent composites
AI-assisted scores are tagged with rationale and confidence
author: Fuxi
